headline: Online Tip
subtitle: The Key to Success
content:
The sprawling Los Santos Map is a useful tool to help stay ahead in Freemode - the blips can help you decide if players are friends or foes (or even prey). Commit this key to memory to ensure you have no nasty surprises.

1 – Your Crew Mates
2 – Your Friends
3 – Friends who are also Crew Mates
4 – Players with a Bounty on their head
5 – Players with a high Mental State
6 – Friends/Players in Apartment
